title: List of all Android material design  tutorial libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android material design  tutorial libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: android-navigationview-tutorial
repoList.description: Sample code provided by www.tutorialwing.com. NavigationView is material design support library that is used to show a drawer on left or right side of the screen. This is a sample code to show both scenario. For More Info Visit -
